The book has a comic tone and addresses the author's thoughts and feelings during each failed marriage proposal that she has received. The book also covers the issue of the late [[age of marriage]] in Egypt due to economic reasons.
==The author== Ghadah (born 21 December 1978, [[El-Mahalla El-Kubra]]) works as a [[pharmacist]]. She introduces herself on her blog as {{quote|a representative of 15 million females from 25 to 35 years who are pressured by the society everyday to get married even though this matter is out of their hands.<ref>[http://www.blogger.com/profile/01770076463246768348 ]{{dead link|date=May 2011}}</ref>}} She remains unmarried (as of 2009).
==Reception== Both the book and the blog are popular among young Egyptians (both males and females).
